title: ArtyTorrent Pack 96-ReFX Nexus 1.3.9 Update-AMPLiFY
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 96-ReFX Nexus 1.3.9 Update-AMPLiFY
---------------------------------------------------

Nexus is a VST ROMpler/synth for PC and Mac which is supplied with 1.4GB of samples for dance music production. It is the de facto virtual "Trance Synth". Expansion packs add to the number of instrument presets available, with various genres of electronica catered for.

This torrent contains the Windows exe file to update the plug-in to version 1.3.9, which fixes several bugs and allows new expansion packs to be used.

If you do not have a working copy of Nexus, then you should download a copy of the main program and all the basic ROM samples before installing this update. The synth will not function without the ROMs.
You can either download everything from http://refx.net/?lang=en&page=products/nexus/downloads or get the demo from http://www.fileshack.com/file.x/10006/Nexus+Demo

If you have Nexus installed and working, simply uninstall it and install this update in its place. Your old presets should be unaffected.

This update is crucial for anyone wishing to install the latest expansions, such as "Analog" and "Bass", which I shall be posting in the coming days.

Further instructions and links are contained in this download.

--
Arty - "It&#039;s just too good not to share"
29th February 2008
